remarks: If a set of reals contains a lower bound, the lower bound is less than or equal to all members of the set.  (Contributed by NM, 9-Oct-2005.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 24-Dec-2016.)
statement:
lble $p |- ( ( S C_ RR /\ E. x e. S A. y e. S x <_ y /\ A e. S ) -> ( iota_ x e. S A. y e. S x <_ y ) <_ A ) $.
$d A y $.
$d S x y $.
